arts.ttl: Marseille boss Roberto De Zerbi weighs up goalkeeper decision ahead of Lorient clash
arts.sum: On the eve of Marseille’s Ligue 1 meeting with Lorient at the Vélodrome (Friday, 20:45), Roberto De Zerbi has a full squad at his disposal but still faces a decision…

Marseille have won just one of their opening three Ligue 1 games this season. Last time out, an early CJ Egan-Riley red card gave them a mountain to climb against Lyon, who found a late winner. Lorie...
